add a account by mobile number.

Parameters:
uid The uid of account which you want to add.
loacl_name The name of account which you want to add.
groupid The groupid of account which you want to add.
desc The name of you send to the user see.
func The operate's callback function's address, and the operate result will pass to this function.
args The operate's callback function's args.
Returns:
0 if fail immediately, or can get the result from func.
